ComicInfo.Title: Count Draco Knuckleduster
ComicInfo.Summary: Count Draco searches for the secret to eternal life and believes Acele is the final key.
ComicInfo.Notes: Scraped metadata from Amazon [ASINB0B1M3T9R5], [RELDATE:2021-08-11] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-12 16:34:02. [Issue ID 2278020]
ComicInfo.ScanInformation: DrVink. Library loans through OverDrive and Kindle; ripped with Calibre DeDRM. Library loans through Hoopla, plus other sources; webrip. Denoised and upscaled with waifu2x-caffe or other tools.
